title: Mycotoxin patulin contamination in various fruits and estimating its dietary impact on the consumers: From orchard to table
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Shahzad Z. Iqbal, Muhammad Waseem, Ahmad Faizal Abdull Razis, Ijaz A. Bhatti, Amin Mousavi Khaneghah, Osama A. Mohammed, Srimathi Priya Lakshminarayanan, Munawar Iqbal
